pages.text: This very sturdy, very blast resistant glass is scattered all around the $(l:dimension/crystal_gardens)Crystal Gardens$(/l).
Between this glass you find these pretty stones that emit a pleasant hum when triggered. You fittingly called those $(italic)Hummingstones$().

It turns out that the pretty sounds of the Hummingstones can build each other up until they shatter in one final anthem.$(br)The shattered remains never seem to stop vibrating, as if they retain some form of inherent energy.
